body.name: Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Mount Compatible with RlNG / Blink Video Doorbell, Not Block Doorbell Motion Sensor, No-Drill Mounting Bracket Wedge Adapter Holder Accessories for Home Rentals Office Room
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 37 mins
features: COMPATIBEL DOORBELLS: QIBOX doorbell mount is compatible with RING video doorbell, as RING Video Doorbell / Video Doorbell 2 / Video Doorbell 3 / Video Doorbell 3 Plus / Video Doorbell 4 / Video Doorbell (2020 Release) The maximum size of video doorbell can be placed inside is 2.55 inch wide * 5.11 inch high * 1.14 inch thick. (Doorbell Not Included).
UPGRADE VIDEO DOOORBELL MOUNT: With anti-theft design doorbell bracket, put the video doorbells fit perfectly inside, keep your video doorbell from being stolen when the door is closed.

WIDE APPLICATION: Suitable for most kind of Anti-theft door, inward opened door, left or right opened door (outward opened door is not suitable), The thickness of the door must be between 0.6 inches and 2.3 inches. You can measuring your door thickness before ordering.

NO-DRILL DOORBELL MOUNT: You can install the doorbell mount in seconds. Put your RING video doorbell in the shell, then adjust the fixed clip according to your door thickness. Simply place video doorbell inside and fixed onto your front door!

PACKAGE INCLUDES: 1x anti-theft video doorbell mount, installation instructions and various installation accessories. Any problem with received products or installation, please feel free to contact us, we will resolve it for you immediately.

reviews.reviewText: Easy installation. Comes with tools to put together. No drill needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Apartment Living
reviews.reviewText: It holds my ring camera perfectly. I haven’t had any trouble with it. It is very easy to install on your door and a necessity for apartment living.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s the only way I can use Ring video doorbell in my apartment without making alterations
reviews.reviewText: I used to think I could never have a Ring video doorbell living in an apartment complex because I would have to drill screws into the wall next to my door and I don’t think the landlord would allow that. I wouldn’t have wanted something that uses adhesive because it could easily be stolen. I didn’t know how to install the Ring video doorbell that works through a peephole and would have had to pay someone to do it. But now they have a zillion different products like this one that allows you to easily mount a Ring (or other brand) video doorbell without making any alterations to your apartment. This one is made of thick plastic and I feel confident that it will deter anyone from stealing my video doorbell. It can only be removed from the inside of your door and the screw holding the mount together is on the back, so it has to be removed before you can access the video doorbell. My brother ended up buying the same product for his new Ring video doorbell when I told him about it, since he rents a house and can’t make alterations either. I did have a little difficulty figuring out how to put it together properly, but eventually I figured it out. I’m guessing there are probably tons of videos showing you how to put it together, but I’m just stubborn and prefer to figure everything out for myself. I’m grateful that someone came up with the idea for something like this. It’s also nice because I can adjust the height as much as I want (though Ring suggests installing it 4 feet high). Hope this review helps someone who is wondering if these things work so they can have a Ring for their apartment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy Install and reasonably secure
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install and non permanent is the best part. Holds the Ring camera well and seems reasonably secure. Doesn't seem easy to rip off of the door. Good Purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly As Described
reviews.reviewText: Really sturdy high quality product. Our door frame is a bit strange (our whole house honestly) so I was not quite sure what to do in order to mount our ring camera. Then I saw this and it is exactly what we needed. It feels super sturdy, and did exactly what it was supposed to. I think it can also fit other sizes of ring cameras other than the one that is pictured so that's cool.
